Author: needmoney
Title: [ANN & AIRDROP] KOREAN PROJECT ZPER MEETS BITCOINTALK -> P2P FINANCE!
Body: AIRDROP  TELEGRAM GROUP!   Website | Onepager | Twitter | Whitepaper | Facebook | Medium | Telegram | Youtube     DECENTRALIZED ECOSYSTEM for P2P Finance    What is ZPER?  ZPER is a ‘decentralized P2P(peer-to-peer) financial ecosystem’ using smart contract technology. Top P2P lending companies and robo-advisors have coalesced to provide a revolutionary method of fund transactions between borrowers and lenders worldwide.    P2P Finance Alliance  Verified global P2P lending companies, information providers, and robo-advisors are part of the ZPER Alliance. The Alliance, which allows a variety of participants to freely interact and exchange values, provides a reasonable financial environment for borrowers and lenders.  All participants will be rewarded fairly for their contributions.    REGISTER FOR KYC!   Cross-border transactions   ZPER connects borrowers and lenders regardless of their countries' currency. Lenders reap higher returns, while borrowers receive loans at lower interest rates.      Risk Management by Robo-advisors   Internationally-recognized robo-advisor algorithms constitute the global investment portfolios. The algorithm is then used to lower investment risk and provide security via investment diversification.      INTRODUCING ZPER TOKEN SALE  Tokensale starts at April 16 201805.00 UTC   Softcap: 5 000 ETH Hardcap: 48 000 ETH     Total supply = 2,200,000,000 ZPR Tokens sold = 1,100,000,000 ZPR Currency accepted: Ethereum    MEET OUR TEAM!    ZPER ALLIANCE

Author: sudhakark
Title: [ANN & AIRDROP] KOREAN PROJECT ZPER MEETS BITCOINTALK -> P2P FINANCE!
Body: ZPER's main objective is to increase the service of the market that can be available in the P2P finance market and provides best offers for the clients by giving trust and gives import and export daily of goods daily . ZPER followed some of the rules in designing a financial ecosystem that helps to join the following conditions •   The global P2P lending platform  will give trust to the investors who are going to participate in it •   provision is enough to expand the global that collects the capital owned by the investors •   Investments exceeding normal limits •   It is impossible for the management to maintain all the bonds and contracts between the management and clients. ZPER creates an environment on the blockchain platform network these entire can connect to the financial service companies. It will create similar ecosystem made up of 500 P2P finance companies that are approved by almost ten countries, nearly thousands of the data providers and Robo consultant companies etc. ZPER offers a constant domain where more than 300 million people, 200 million of free business and more than 300,000 SMEs to increase the funds or to deposit the money by the investors.

Author: pghr12aditya_s
Title: [ANN & AIRDROP] KOREAN PROJECT ZPER MEETS BITCOINTALK -> P2P FINANCE!
Body: It looks like a very unique proposition. There are multiple platforms which might be offering this but bringing it on blockchain would be revolutionary. Small Businesses, Individuals and SMEs are struggling with the current traditional financing where the only party that benefits is the banks.  Additionally, there's no accountability as well (Read: Bank/Lending Frauds).  Creating an allied network of lenders and bringing it on blockchain will kill the flaws listed above. Moreover, the lenders and borrowers will also benefit due to low fee / interest. Sound like a good project overall.

Author: saharsh89
Title: [ANN & AIRDROP] KOREAN PROJECT ZPER MEETS BITCOINTALK -> P2P FINANCE!
Body: This is an amazing way of helping businesses in the developing countries grow with planned lending from the developed world.  The difference in interest between developed and developing worlds has always been a great opportunity, never leveraged by the existing banking systems. Platforms like ZPER will not only pave the way for financing businesses for SMEs, but also provide a good risk vs return ratio to financiers from the developed world.  Such ecosystems will tend to benefit themselves as well. Their self-reliance and transparency, with the help of blockchain, will ensure better trust and enhanced security for all participants.

Title: [ANN & AIRDROP] KOREAN PROJECT ZPER MEETS BITCOINTALK -> P2P FINANCE!
Body: ZPER is creating a difference by integrating global P2P lenders and borrowers. Most other P2P lenders limit their focus to a specific sector like SME, MSME or Enterprises, but ZPER is creating an ecosystem which will benefit everyone - Students, Individuals, Organizations (Small and Big), and everyone who is interesting in lending or borrowing on a global platform.  This kind of a holistic approach will create headwinds around the globe. Innovations in the fin-tech space just keep rolling.
